Disease.content:

In general, a "Disease" entity refers to any condition that impairs normal functioning and causes damage to an organism. This can include a wide range of medical conditions, such as infections, genetic disorders, chronic illnesses, and mental health disorders.

Once you provide the paragraph, I can help you identify any specific disease entities that are mentioned.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.
